rule.name: EAP_populateRequestData
rule.description: Expression rule to populate new request data
rule.definition: a!localVariables( local!processControllerMasterId: index( #"_a-0000e4e9-ef8d-8000-5259-1bef901bef90_359325"( processId: ri!processId, runConfigId: if( isnull( index( ri!requestData, "runConfigId", null ) ), ri!runConfigId, index( ri!requestData, "runConfigId", null ) ), isActive: 1 ), "process_controller_master_id", {} ), local!schedulerPagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"( startIndex: 1, batchSize: 1, sort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"( field: "run_time_scheduler_detail_id", ascending: false() ) ), local!matchingSchedulerDetails: #"_a-0000e4cd-1af4-8000-5255-1bef901bef90_192921"( processId: ri!processId, runConfigId: if( isnull( index( ri!requestData, "runConfigId", null ) ), ri!runConfigId, index( ri!requestData, "runConfigId", null ) ), isActive: 0, pagingInfo: local!schedulerPagingInfo ), local!schedulerDetailId: if( #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!schedulerDetailId), tointeger(index(local!matchingSchedulerDetails,"run_time_scheduler_detail_id",0)), ri!schedulerDetailId ), cast( typeof( 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:EAP}EAP_T_ProcessRequest'() ), { requestId: index( ri!requestData, "requestId", null ), processId: ri!processId, runConfigId: if( isnull( index( ri!requestData, "runConfigId", null ) ), ri!runConfigId, index( ri!requestData, "runConfigId", null ) ), processControllerMasterId: local!processControllerMasterId, requestCurrStatus: index( ri!requestData, "requestCurrStatus", null ), requestMonth: month( today() ), requestYear: year( today() ), makerId: index( ri!requestData, "makerId", null ), checkerId: index( ri!requestData, "checkerId", null ), appianProcessInstanceId: ri!processInstanceId, runTimeSchedulerDetailId: local!schedulerDetailId, isAdhocTrigger: if( isNull( ri!isAdhocTrigger ), false(), ri!isAdhocTrigger ), createdBy: if( isnull( index( ri!requestData, "createdBy", null ) ), ri!loggedInUser, index( ri!requestData, "createdBy", null ) ), createdOn: if( isnull( index( ri!requestData, "createdOn", null ) ), now(), index( ri!requestData, "createdOn", null ) ), updatedBy: if( isnull( ri!loggedInUser ), loggedInUser(), ri!loggedInUser ), updatedOn: now() } ) )
